pages.text: Vetulicola is a marine organism from the enigmatic phylum Vetulicolia. Its body had 2 parts, a main body which included the gills and the mouth as well as the tail. It was thought to have either been a filter feeder or a detritivore.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
